thread.title: Rich People, You Crazy! Manmade Floating Islands
thread.title_full: Rich People, You Crazy! Manmade Floating Islands

title: Rich People, You Crazy! Manmade Floating Islands
text:
Rich People, You Crazy! Manmade Floating Islands Bilie Cohen August 18, 2015 The Maldives are sinking, so what better way to make the country last than by building some manmade islands. Of course, these new islands are available only to the extremely wealthy. And as you’d expect, they’re going to be jaw-droppingly gorgeous — both above the water and below it. Tumblr 1 / 9 Floating islands for the super rich 
The project is called Amillarah Private Islands, and it’s a collaboration between Christie’s International Real Estate and Dutch Docklands, a company that builds floating homes in the Netherlands to counter rising sea levels there. So it’s not much of a leap for some smart developers to finally combine the outrageous luxury of the Maldives with its serious sinking problem and come up with this multimillion-dollar solution. It's a slam dunk: Rich people love private islands. (Image: Amillarah Private Islands)
